product_name: Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Clean/Dirty Half Cube
long_description: No time to dry your swimsuit before the flight home? No worries! Tuck it in the water-resistant side of the Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Clean/Dirty Half Cube, away from dry clothes in the other side. Main compartment compresses and carries either folded or rolled clothing; a thinner, lined water-resistant compartment isolates dirty or damp items. 2 sets of 2-way zippers make it easy to open and close either side when packed full. Made of washable, odor-resistant polyester with a mesh top so you can see what's inside. Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Clean/Dirty Half Cube measures 10 x 7 x 3.5 in.
short_description: No time to dry your swimsuit before the flight home? No worries! Tuck it in the water-resistant side of the Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Clean/Dirty Half Cube, away from dry clothes in the other side.
